root.name: Gabrielleâ€™s Ghostly Groove
root.description: Gabrielle's got a big problem--she sneezed her very soul out of her body, turning into a ghost of her former self. Now she must go on a rhythm-driven adventure to Monster Town to win it back. By dancing and entertaining the supernatural creatures dwelling in Monster Town, Gabrielle will accumulate the power needed to return her to a physical form.
